mapper.select: SELECT qnano, qnacode, qnatitle, qnapassword, qnacontent, qnawriter, qnawriternickname, qnaispublic, qnareplycount, qnawritetime ,qnaisdeleted FROM( SELECT row_number() over (order by qnano desc) as seqnum, A.qnano,C.code_desc as qnacode, A.qnatitle, A.qnapassword, A.qnacontent,A.qnawriter,A.qnawriternickname, A.qnaispublic, A.qnareplycount, A.qnawritetime, A.qnaisdeleted FROM qna A INNER JOIN COMMON C ON A.qnacode = C.code AND C.code_group like 'QnA.QnAcode' WHERE A.qnaisdeleted like 'false' ) WHERE seqnum BETWEEN (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}+1 and #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY qnano desc
SELECT count(*) FROM qna WHERE qnaisdeleted like 'false'
